Screenings

Blue Horizons: A Journey with Nomads

Dunbar Town House Museum and Gallery

High Street

Dunbar

EH42 1ER


t/ 01568 866030


'Blue Horizons' debut film A Journey with Nomads will be screened continuously in the exhibition space of Emma Herman-Smith's 'In a Natural State' at Dunbar House. This is an exhibition looking at natural landscapes and human interaction with them. Click the link below for information on admissions to the exhibition.


2pm-4pm April 5th 2014
